## Location

Where is the issue? (e.g. `README.md`, `examples/ownership/ownership.brn`, inline comment in `semantic.rs`)

## Issue

Describe what's wrong, unclear, or missing.

## Suggested Fix

If you have a correction or improvement in mind, paste it here. Otherwise, just describe what would make this clearer.

## Additional Context

Anything else that might be helpful.
